title: Mask mystery: Why are U.S. officials dismissive of protective covering?
description: Other nations recommend wearing masks to avoid coronavirus, but the Trump administration has not seen a benefit.
content: A group of mostly UK researchers, publishing in the Lancet, a top peer-reviewed medical journal, on March 20, recommended that "vulnerable populations, such as older adults and those with underlying medical conditions, should wear face masks if available. Uni… [+2695 chars]
